A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've never been genuinely angry at a movie until now. Bad movies are badly written or made but this is almost sacrilegious. The Star Wars universe\, characters and backstory that we've learned to love is ruined by effin Rian Johnson. Some really unnecessary and stupid scenes are really out of place e.g the steam iron scene - like it was stolen from Mel Brooks Spaceballs.
